name: ShorelineDetection_beta
description: Writes tide prediction JSON, shoreline GeoJSON, and NDWI GeoTIFF.

inputPortDescriptors.name: cat_id
inputPortDescriptors.description: Catalog ID of the image to be processed.

inputPortDescriptors.name: minsize
inputPortDescriptors.description: Minimum coastline enclosed area/speckle suppression. (Default: 1000.0 pixels)

inputPortDescriptors.name: smooth
inputPortDescriptors.description: Corner smoothing from 0 (no smoothing) to 1.33 (no corners). (Default: 1.0)

inputPortDescriptors.name: image
inputPortDescriptors.description: The multispectral image (NDWI and shoreline detection).
